Colorado_Springs.Aeroflex Colorado Springs: Aeroflex Colorado Springs, a division of Aeroflex Microelectronic Solutions, is a manufacturer of integrated circuits for the aerospace, defense, medical, industrial, and security markets. It is located in Colorado Springs, Colorado. Aeroflex mixed-signal ASICs and standard products containing data acquisition, communication, and processing circuits are supplied for uses such as medical imaging, safety-critical industrial, point-of-sale, and secure data processing systems.
